comment: Regardless of how you feel about Trump and his actions and foreign policy decisions , US troops are in harm s way . Keep them and their loved ones in your thoughts and prayers . They are simply doing what their Commander-in-Chief was unwilling to do , valiantly serve our country .
amr:
# ::snt Regardless of how you feel about Trump and his actions and foreign policy decisions , US troops are in harm s way . Keep them and their loved ones in your thoughts and prayers . They are simply doing what their Commander-in-Chief was unwilling to do , valiantly serve our country .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / have-mod-91
            :ARG1 (t / troop
                  :mod (c / country
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "US")))
            :ARG2 (w / way
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / harm-01))
            :ARG1-of (r / regardless-91
                  :ARG2 (t2 / thing
                        :ARG1-of (f / feel-01
                              :ARG0 (y / you)
                              :ARG2 (a / and
                                    :op1 (a2 / act-02
                                          :ARG0 (p / person
                                                :name (n2 / name
                                                      :op1 "Trump")))
                                    :op2 (d / decide-01
                                          :ARG0 p
                                          :ARG3 (p2 / policy-01
                                                :ARG2 (f2 / foreign)))))))
            :snt2 (k / keep-04
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (t3 / think-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG2 (a4 / and
                                    :op1 t
                                    :op2 (p3 / person
                                          :ARG1-of (l / love-01
                                                :ARG0 t))))
                        :op2 (p4 / pray-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG2 a4)))
            :snt3 (d2 / do-02
                  :ARG0 (t4 / they)
                  :ARG1 t2
                  :ARG1-of (d3 / do-02
                        :ARG0 (p5 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h3 / have-rel-role-91
                                    :ARG1 t4
                                    :ARG2 (c2 / commander-in-chief)))
                        :ARG2-of (w2 / will-02
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG0 t4)))
            :ARG1-of (s / simple-02)
            :ARG2 (s2 / serve-01
                  :ARG0 t4
                  :ARG2 (c3 / country
                        :poss (w3 / we))
                  :manner (v / valiant))))

comment: I'm capable of separating the troops from Trump . Thank you very much just the same . The troops are victims of Trump . The same as the rest of us non Republicans .
amr:
# ::snt I'm capable of separating the troops from Trump . Thank you very much just the same . The troops are victims of Trump . The same as the rest of us non Republicans .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / capable-01
            :ARG1 (ii / i)
            :ARG2 (s / separate-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (t / troop)
                  :ARG2 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Trump"))))
      :snt2 (t2 / thank-01
            :ARG0 ii)
      :ARG1 (y / you)
      :ARG2 (s2 / same-01
            :ARG1 y
            :mod (j / just)
            :degree (v / very))
      :snt3 (v2 / victim
            :domain (t3 / troop)
            :poss p)
      :snt4 (s3 / same-01
            :ARG2 (r / rest
                  :ARG1-of (ii2 / include-91
                        :ARG2 (w / we
                              :mod (p2 / political-party
                                    :polarity -
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Republican")))))))

comment: I'm Republican and also a victim of Trump . We all are , even those who support him . If we don't remove him , we are all screwed .
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (p2 / political-party
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Republican"
                              :op2 "Party")))
            :domain (ii / i)
            :mod (a / also)
            :ARG1-of (v / victimize-01
                  :ARG0 (p3 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Trump"))))
      :snt2 (s / screw-02
            :ARG1 (w / we
                  :mod (a2 / all))
            :condition (r / remove-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 w)
            :ARG1 p3))
